titleStmt.title: Epithalamium, or, Solomons song together with the songs of Moses, Exod. 15, & Deut. 32, the Song of Deborah, Judges 5, the Song of Hannah, I Samuel 2, the Churches song, Isa. 26 / digested into a known and familiar meeter by Samuel Slater.
titleStmt.author: Slater, Samuel, d. 1704.

publicationStmt.publisher: Printed by J. Moxon for William Luggar and Livewel Chapman,

notesStmt.note: Consists of the metrical version and the Biblical text in parallel columns.
Reproduction of original in the British Library.
